title: Chris Hemsworth Installs Solar Panels, Karni Sena Has An Issue With Bigg Boss & More From Ent
text:
As most of us have seen, House of Cards, which was a Netflix show, revolved around a Democrat who climbed his way to the US presidential office. It featured Kevin Spacey and Robin Wright in the lead. Saif said the show is based on Indian politics and is set on a massive scale.

In an interview to The Times of India, Nupur Alankar revealed that she had transferred all her savings to her PMC bank account and now she had to borrow money as little as Rs 500 from people.

As their house nears completion after three years of construction work, it appears that Chris and Elsa are hoping to rely on renewable energy sources as much as possible. The roof is now almost completely covered with rectangular solar panels, which will provide plenty of electricity during the hotter months. Take a look.

On and off, they have been making headlines since then. From movies like Manikarnika to Article 15, they have had objections and threats for several people from the film fraternity.

It is a problem, no doubt. I don’t only have to compete with Mission Impossible and The Avengers but also with myself. I am expected to raise the level of action with every film. It is a challenge but a welcome challenge,” he told Bollywood Humgama in an interview.
